data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liljeblad, Johan, Nieves-Aldrey, José Luis, Neser, Stefan, Melika, George (2011): Adding another piece to the cynipoid puzzle: the description of a new tribe, genus and species of gall wasp (Hymenoptera: Cynipidae) endemic to The Republic of South Africa. Zootaxa 2806: 35-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.205510
